I've seen youtubers play this so I know I'd love it.

HOWEVER, I have not been able to play. I can create a lobby for a killer but no one ever shows up in it. I push survivor and I get that loading screen that never goes away. It forever says loading and keeps whiting up that logo, but never goes to a lobby. 

The game would be fun but since I can't play I want my money back so i can buy a game that will actually work and that I can actually play. Or the DEVS can fix this problem so I can play. Whichever. Just make one happen.

Price : Its better in sale (dont buy deluxe pls)

Um jogo muito bom, apesar de acontecer muitos bugs envolvendo o tela de loading. Mas Ã© um Ã³timo jogo

Now, i've played the game on free weekend only, but i bought it just now and this is how i feel towards the game...

It's fun sometimes, but typically very aggravating. The dev team does an extremely bad job balancing the Killers/Survivors, which is going to be difficult in the first place, but they don't listen to their community. They end up buffing all the wrong things and nerfing the one that already been nerfed. You will be farmed by teammates, you will be tunneled by Killers and occassionally you will be camped and there's no real penalty to doing any of the listed toxicity. In certain situations, it's understandable to do one of the stated actions, but it shouldn't be shined on.

The game's fun but unfixed bugs and glitches still here and there that they can't fix without making even more irritating bugs. I'm really dissappointed that the dev team is careless. Shame that the game is very addiciting and is fun when play with friends. In fact this is the first game that i ever bought off of steam. 

Save your money and get it only on sale

æ®µä½13é–‹å§‹çš„é¬¼éƒ½å¤ªé åŒ—äº†ï¼Œè·Ÿä¸ç”¨èªªäººé¡ï¼Œäººé¡æ›´çš®ã€‚

Extremely fun game. I rarely get bored of playing it. 
Cons:
    - Dead Hard
    - Very toxic players as you rise in rank (low rank is just casual retards mostly)
    - Many bugs and exploits that will nearly make you rage some matches
Pros:
    - If you can get past toxicity and play around it, you'll enjoy every game
    - Lasts 10-20 minutes max
    - Constantly being updated to get rid of bugs and apply balances.
    - Michael Myers is a playable character.
    - Very spooky game, and must play with sound.

El juego esta muy bueno, pero le falta un poco de amor.

Toxicity and bugs describe this game that's all you need to know

Edit: This game is cool and all but once you get hit with the same bugs over and over, it gets pretty annoying and honestly the devs don't seem to care about anything but cosmetics. The number one problem in this game is hitboxes. It feels awful to be hit with something knowing it shouldn't have hit you as a survivor, and as killer it just feels unrewarding to hit a survivor knowing you didn't earn it. I can only speak for myself so I'm not going to pretend to know what everyone is thinking. Balancing is a big problem as well, I remember when this game was COMPLETELY survivor sided but now it's just "oh well it's spirit guess I just lose" or it's "oh that wasn't a fast vault, well guess I'll just die". If you are playing this game without friends expect to lose because that's just how it is now (Unless you actually get good randoms). If you are playing with friends, you actually stand a chance but be prepared to hear the killer complain about how broken "Survive with Friends" is. All in all this game is an addiction it isn't fun it isn't enjoyable it's just an addiction, don't believe anything stated above? Try the game out and then see for yourself.
the game is an absolute dumpster and that's why we all love it

Fix your stupid game you incompetent french canadians. 
>Get hit constantly miles away from windows, pallets and just in general
>constantly hit injured people, hear them scream, see blood spatters, and they just keep running
>every six months get an update that tweaks one perk
NICE

The game is decent the idea and characters are great! However there are many many balancing, and graphical glitches that still are not  fixed since early on in the games creation. For example textures not loading in, or the animations not working as intended. Also match making, and servers could use a big upgrade. ( not like you guys can't afford it.) Lastly the community isn't great, but that's a  very hard thing to fix in game online game, so not going to knock ya too bad for that. 

In conclusion i like playing it, and the idea is awesome. However it could be improved on in many area's. So if you plan to purchase the game. Just be  ready for some bullsh*t to occur for this isn't out of the ordinary. 

There's also some serious connection issues i've run into recently. So I changed my thumbs up to a thumbs down.

There was a time this game was fun. There was a time I didn't have to worry about killers hitting me 25 feet away in a chase, 10 feet away from a vault, through pallets, over pallets, behind terrain with hatchets, the list goes on. Anything that shouldn't be possible to hurt survivors is 100% possible. The dedicated servers are complete and utter trash, aiming for 150ms ping? Further making those problems worse which they haven't addressed in literally years. Yet, they continue to nerf gameplay aspects of survivor but give additional blood-points so "survivors don't feel discouraged" which only further hurts their already TERRIBLE ranking system they have in place. Survivors that belong in rank 10 or worse are in red ranks because getting blood-points is way too easy now. It's impossible to play this game in solo-que or even duo-que and feel good about your game play.

Devs and killers still think this game is just as hard for them as it was in 2016, and they could not be more delusional. The game is beyond easy for killers right now. You can watch any killer main on Twitch, or ask anyone that mains killer how their last 30 killer games have gone, and they get a 4k in at least 80% of their games. But they STILL continue to buff killer and nerf survivor over and over and over again.

I understand this game was a horrible experience to play for killer years ago, but this game has been in a perfectly playable spot for killer for at LEAST 2 years. Yes some maps are awful to play on as killer, and playing against a good coordinated swf can be a terrible experience(even though killers exaggerate how often they face them because they just don't exist anymore). But with the current state of patching, server status, ranking, matchmaking, how op their add-ons are, pallet changes, map changes, loop changes, HITBOXES, literally EVERYTHING favoring killers(besides a very few amount of shitty maps), it amazes me that killers still complain. The devs are making this game way too easy for killer, and as the days go on, it's getting more and more unfun to play as survivor. Yet they wonder why survivors with hundreds to thousands of hours are quitting this game. It took the devs literal YEARS to help killers out, and I don't see them doing the same for survivors for years, if not ever. 

They need to quit balancing this game with the mindset that all survivors play like the ones with thousands of hours that know how to perfectly run all the tiles, or like all survivors are in a   survive with friends group. The reality is every game there are 1 or 2 players that hide the entire game, then the other 2-3 survivors only enjoy the aspect of chase, or they're too altruistic, or they just watch the chase from a distance with a flashlight waiting for someone to go down(only for the killer to look at a wall so the flashlight save is impossible), or they just disconnect the moment they go down to the killer, which is just an awful experience for everyone(even the killer doesn't feel as satisfied). And all of those things happen almost every single game... Even in red ranks which are supposedly the "good ranks". No one wants to do gens. The chase aspect is awful because of the RIDICULOUS state of hitboxes. Bloodpoint distribution is way too generous making a terrible ranking system(even though that might not matter when matchmaking is getting a survivor of each rank color every game). Nothing actually feels rewarding to play this game as a survivor. My recommendation, don't even bother playing survivor, especially as a new player. It's only going to get worse for survivors, and killers will continue to have everything handed to them on a silver platter. Just play killer if you're looking for any ounce of fun in this game.
